text:
I would like to use Julia for an efficient CFD simulation, most of my operations element wise on tensor, comparable to
`(Y[0:-2, 1:-1, 1:-1] + Y[2   , 1:-1, 1:-1]) / (dx1**2) +` 
`(Y[1:-1, 0:-2, 1:-1] + Y[1:-1, 2:,   1:-1]) / (dx2**2) +`
`(Y[1:-1, 1:-1, 0:-2] + Y[1:-1, 1:-1, 2:  ]) / (dx3**2)`
 `- 2*Y[1:-1, 1:-1, 1:-1]*(1/dx1**2+1/dx2**2+1/dx3**2)`  Which package(s) should I use for this purpose?
